1.2.name: wordpress/advanced-last-posts-by-invento-solutions
1.2.description:
Advanced Last Posts plugin is a light plugin, which allows for increased customization for displaying recent posts from multiple categories or from custom post types.

Features:

1.Plugin

  • Add New - you can use add new post with featured image.
  • Category - you can view and add new Category.
  • Options - you can choose where from you can use posts (From plugin or default Posts Wordpress).
  • Help - lists of shortcodes.

2.Widget - Title - Name of the section. - Number of Posts - display number of last posts. - Show posts thumbnail - featured image will display when this checkbox is checked. - Thumbnail size - It will only work when 'Show posts thumbnail' is checked. - Posts excerpt in words - Number of words to display. It works only if Posts excerpt is checked. - Read more text - You can display "read more" text. It works only if Posts excerpt is checked.

** .Works with placing a shortcode.
